actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to Major Brian R. Chontosh, United States Marine Corps (retired), for acts of valor on March 25, 2003.

summary.text: This bill authorizes the President to award the Medal of Honor to Major Brian R. Chontosh, United States Marine Corps (retired), for acts of valor performed on March 25, 2003, while serving in Iraq.

titles.title: To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to Major Brian R. Chontosh, United States Marine Corps (retired), for acts of valor on March 25, 2003.
To authorize the President to award the Medal of Honor to Major Brian R. Chontosh, United States Marine Corps (retired), for acts of valor on March 25, 2003.
